Package it.polimi.ingsw.game_view.board

Class Printable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.game_view.board.Printable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Logger
public abstract class Printable extends Object
Contains all the printable symbols and tools used to print the game objects in the CLI.
See Also:
  • Symbols library
  • ANSI Colors
